content:
As an AI language model, I cannot have opinions, but here are some trendy font options that could work well for creating a modern look on your website:

1. Avenir: Avenir is a popular modern sans-serif font. It comes in several weights and styles and has a clean, modern look. 2. Montserrat: Montserrat is a geometric sans-serif font that has gained popularity in recent years. It has a trendy, modern look and comes in several weights. 3. Playfair Display: Playfair Display is a stylish serif font with a modern twist. Its unique letterforms make it stand out and it works well for headings or text accents. 4. Raleway: Raleway is a sans-serif font that has a unique, modern look. It comes in several weights and styles and is easy to read on screens. Remember, it's important to choose a font that fits your website brand and content. While these fonts may be trendy now, they may not be appropriate for all types of websites, and you should always test your font choices for legibility and readability.
